name: Potion store
description:
Welcome to the Potion Store!

We have a total of 7 potions and these are our prices:

  • Love potion❤ → 36☾
  • Mental focus tonic⊙ → 32☾
  • Elixir protection◎ → 30☾
  • Liquid luck♣ → 29☾
  • Nightmares remedy☠  → 28☾
  • Purifying drink☆ → 27☾
  • Money potion◆ → 21☾

Can you help us make more potions?

Use arrow keys.

Made with Bitsy.
